body_content.explanation: having good judgment about what will be needed in the future and making wise decisions based on this:
examples: Buying those shares was a very farsighted move—they must be worth ten times their original value now.
It is rare to find such a farsighted and courageous politician.
It was far-sighted to advocate the development of a light rail system.

body_content.explanation: able to see things clearly that are far away but not clearly see things that are near you:
examples: I'm so farsighted, I can't read the newspaper without my glasses.
Many children are slightly farsighted (they cannot see close objects clearly) but don't need glasses, because they will likely outgrow the condition.
